widgets_values: still image, slowmotion, 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走.

nodes.title: Prompt
widgets_values:
Animate this image into a short, cinematic video clip.

[ENVIRONMENT CLEANUP]
Remove any extra out-of-place objects.
The overall space appears clean, warm, and well maintained.

[ACTION]
5H1V, the woman walks over to the man, gets on her knees and puts his penis in her mouth and starts sucking his penis.

[STABILITY & SHARPNESS CONTROL]
Maintain consistent texture, color, and geometry across all frames.
All motion smooth and continuous; no flicker, ghosting, or motion blur.
Subject stays in sharp focus; background softly blurred with stable depth of field.
Lighting and exposure remain unchanged; last frame sharp and fully resolved.

[LIGHTING, VISUAL QUALITY & CINEMATIC STYLE]
Even illumination with gentle warmth; no harsh shadows or bright spots.
Use soft, diffused lighting to create a peaceful ambience.
Render in ultra-high definition with realistic lighting and balanced exposure.
Maintain crisp focus on the primary subject; textures and materials fully detailed.
Color grading natural and filmic—accurate skin tones, smooth highlights, deep contrast.
Shadows soft and noise-free; no grain, no compression artifacts.
Depth of field shallow enough to isolate the subject while keeping context visible.
Motion smooth, continuous, and free of flicker or jitter.
Lighting and color remain constant across all frames.

[FINAL NOTES]
Duration = 3 seconds. Smooth, realistic pacing, stable motion.
